Belgium: Fund-raising lottery held to fund the opening of Mounts of piety in the Low Countries.
Burma: Min Khamaung recovers Sandwip.  Beginning of Arakanese raids on Dakha
France: Sixteen-year-old Louis exiled his mother and took control of the government.
Russia: Ingrian War: The Treaty of Stolbovo ended the war. Kexholm, Ingria, Estonia and Livonia went to Sweden.
Sweden: Treaty of Stolbovo ends Ingrian War: Russia cedes province and fortress of Kexholm, southwestern Karelia and province of Ingria to Sweden, laying foundation for Sweden's rise as a Great Power
